Name: PRIMARY GLYCOL LOOP ACTIVATION
checklistText:
<size=21>PRIMARY GLYCOL LOOP ACTIVATION</size>

1.
PANEL 2:
	ECS:
		PRESS ind pwr fail lt - on
		GLYCOL ind pwr fail lt - on
		QUANTITY ind pwr fail lt - on
		GLYCOL comp caut lt - on

2.
PANEL 11:
	Verify:
	CB ECS:
		GLYCOL PUMP 1 - open
		GLYCOL PUMP 2 - open
		GLYCOL PUMP AUTO TRNFR - open

3.
PANEL 16:
	CB ECS:	DISP - close
		* Following indicator power failure 
		* lights - off when CB ECS: DISP is closed:
		* ECS:
		*	PRESS
		* 	GLYCOL
		* 	QUANTITY

4.
PANEL 2:
	GLYCOL sel - PUMP 1
	ECS:	GLYCOL press ind - record: _______
	GLYCOL sel - INST (SEC)
	ECS:	GLYCOL press ind - record: _______
5.
PANEL 2:
	GLYCOL sel - PUMP 2

6.
PANEL 11:
	CB ECS:
		GLYCOL PUMP AUTO TRNFR - close
		GLYCOL PUMP 1 - close
		GLYCOL PUMP AUTO TRNFR - open

7.
PANEL 2:
	GLYCOL sel - PUMP 1

8.
PANEL 11:
	CB ECS:	GLYCOL PUMP 2 - close

9.
PANEL 2:
	GLYCOL press ind - 21 to 27 psia
	GLYCOL comp caut lt - off
